name: Senior C++ Developer (Germany, Munich)
description:
Prospective startup developing cutting-edge, innovative imaging technologies to advance healthcare and address global clinical needs is seeking a Senior C++ Developer.

The company is building new hardware, software, and data processing technologies.

You will design and develop high-quality, high-performance software applications for a revolutionary medical imaging system.

You are offered to work in the company's office located in Munich, Germany.

Your tasks:

  • Solving complex problems, ensuring interaction of equipment for efficient data processing
  • Adapting existing solutions and finding new ones based on real data
  • Managing requirements with ALM tool

Requirements:

  • 5+ years of experience as a C++ developer
  • Experience interfacing ASICs and FPGAs
  • Proven track record of generating innovative concepts
  • BS or MS in computer science or related study background
  • English B2+

Will be a plus:

  • Familiarity with cybersecurity requirements applicable to medical device software development (e.g., UL 2900, FDA Cybersecurity guidance document)
  • Experience with regulatory requirements specifically in medical software development (e.g., ISO 62304)
  • Basic knowledge of mechanical engineering and electrical engineering

The company offers you:

  • Decent salary up to 6600 EUR gross
  • Relocation support to Germany
  • Work at a startup developing advanced imaging systems that improve healthcare
  • Dynamic, multinational team of highly skilled professionals
  • Team culture and individual development
  • Flexible work environment and international culture
